name: Zephyr Shadowstep
backstory: Zephyr Shadowstep, once a notorious thief in the sprawling city of Nighthaven, now seeks redemption by exploring the Spooky Story Maze. Armed with unparalleled stealth and a sharp wit, Zephyr hopes to use their skills for good, all while unable to resist the allure of any shiny treasures they might encounter along the way.
